metadata.title: CVE-2024-25742 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.9, an untrusted hypervisor can inject virtualinterrupt 29 (#VC) at any point in time and can trigger its handler. Thisaffects AMD SEV-SNP and AMD SEV-ES.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
